creator: courtney.thomas9@verizon.net
text:
I received the error message below after installing and building version 2.0.43 
in solaris 2.8 environment using the following start up command as 
root: /datafiles/apache2src/apache2/bin/apachectl start

"ld.so.1 fatal /datafiles/apache2src/apache2/bin/httpd libdb-3.1.so open failed 
no such file or directory
Killed"

I have checked httpd.conf and all the other files but can find nothing to solve 
this.  Any help would be greatly appreciated.
Wm. Courtney Thomas DBA

libdb is presumably installed on your system, but the dynamic loader
configuration has not been updated to find it.  Update that configuration or set
the LD_LIBRARY_PATH to include the directory where libdb is located.

Example:

When you install the Sun Freeware CD for Solaris, libdb is installed in
/opt/sfw/lib but the dynamic loader configuration is not updated to search
there.  Try this:

LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/opt/sfw/lib apachectl start
creator: trawick@apache.org
